name: Blobby Boy Boxing
description:
In this pocket universe of Blobby, you must prove you are worthy enough to be the next big boss of the realm.

rules--------------

Half-Boxing Half-sumo wresting you must punch your opponent onto the edge to gain a foothold on the match and punch them off of the edge to win. 

modes------- 

training - learn the game/learn your place

ARCADE matches - best out of three

The Gantlet - fight random boxers with a best out of one  

controls--------------

dodge left - left arrow

dodge right - right arrow

Punch-up arrow

UI/menu - mouse and left click

The game was created by Whitevault

Music was created by NateTheSoundNinja

additional boxers were created by the WhiteVault Twitch community 

PLEASE READ THE CREDITS IN GAME!
